words.def: (superlative of `many' used with count nouns and often preceded by `the') quantifier meaning the greatest in number
(ethnic slur) offensive and derogatory name for a Black man who is abjectly servile and deferential to Whites
(ethnic slur) offensive and derogatory name for a Black man who is abjectly servile and deferential to Whites
the syllable naming the fifth (dominant) note of any musical scale in solmization
Toward a closed, touching or engaging position.
